<h1><b>FROST</b></h1>
<pre>
After n00b revealed the string, cryptic methods were changed. 
This new method required a key to encrypt/decrypt which was given to all members. Aryan sent a cryptic message to vampire. 
Vampire however was in a different dimension so the key had not been given to him. 
Fortunately he recovered the original message in a short while. 
See if you can also recover it! <a href="http://static.beast.sdslabs.co/static/FROST/crypt.txt">Here</a> is the cryptic text.
</pre>
<h3><b>Solution</b></h3>
<p>Eksekusi seluruh string hex dengan <a href="https://github.com/hellman/xortool">xortools</a></p>

```console
root@Python:/home/venom/Downloads# echo "" > flag.hex
root@Python:/home/venom/Downloads# xortool -x -c " " flag.hex 
The most probable key lengths:
 3:  12.2%
 6:  19.7%
 9:   9.5%
12:  14.4%
15:   7.4%
18:  10.7%
21:   5.8%
24:   8.1%
30:   6.9%
36:   5.3%
Key-length can be 3*n
1 possible key(s) of length 6:
H7sKD9
Found 1 plaintexts with 95%+ valid characters
See files filename-key.csv, filename-char_used-perc_valid.csv
root@Python:/home/venom/Downloads# cat xortool_out/* | grep -i flag
Well the flag is sha256 hash of {road_not_travelled_robert_frost}file_name;char_used;perc_valid
root@Python:/home/venom/Downloads# 
```
<h3><b>Flag</b></h3>
<pre>
{road_not_travelled_robert_frost}
</pre>
